__e: It's how I've felt the past ten years, but I had to trust that you and Lena were always looking out for B's best interest, now you have to trust me.
Yeah, I am, 'cause he's dead because of whatever the hell it was you two were up to.
Now you can go back to whatever you were doing or pretending not to.
I mean, come on, what were you thinking?
I mean -- but it would certainly help him if he knew exactly what you and Ray were thinking of.
What in the hell were you two thinking?
Now the last time I saw you, you were talking to the Hand of the King.
About what you and mom were talking about and why you were out that night.
You two were talking, uh, yakking away, but I don't know what you were talking...
I wanted to think it was you, but the two of you were in the same room that night.
I know that you and the man who murdered those bank robbers were in it together, and I told the authorities everything I know.
It looks like you were probably in the middle of something, but I did figure it out, so let's...
I mean, I'm sure there are things you've saved from the times when you weren't together, you know.
I saw it when the two of you were together, and I saw it again this morning.
I thought you and my daughter were together, but it wasn't you I saw.
